resources.string: Connect any USB input device to your phone using OTG and make them work over wifi
Tip: Avoid using shortcut keys while working on USB keyboard, You can map your usb game-pad by creating new profile below.
Current we have two different profiles to use. you can create your own custom profile
Your phone\'s screen should be kept ON all the time while using USB device currently the screen is ON but its blank to save energy. swipe at the top and bottom area of the phone for more options.
